group_1.textCenter: Hello there...@It's unusual to see you interfering.

group_1.narration: "It's because you told Suzune something@she didn't need to know."
"You almost ruined the plan, didn't you?"

group_1.textCenter: "If you could just keep it a secret, it's fine."

group_1.narration: "...That’s right, that’s the kind of guy you are."

group_1.textCenter: Or, more accurately, you used your abilities...
To "rewrite the memories of Matsuri@and the others," didn't you?

group_1.narration: "That many people was a lot of work..."
"But, well...@It's much better than being interrupted by Matsuri,@who still remembers that she met Suzune@a long time ago."
"Matsuri should just forget about everything else@and enjoy sightseeing in Kamihama..."

group_1.textCenter: What are you going to do with Suzune?

group_1.narration: "Send her back to Hozuki City, of course?"
"I've wiped away all those unnecessary memories@and everything's back to normal."
"I'm going now, but don't forget your promise."

group_1.textCenter: Of course I'll keep my word,@because I never lie.
